messages.text: Hey Ryan ‚Äî status check on Team HQ Dashboard. Chris is asking for an update.
MVP is done and pushed to GitHub. Waiting on Render deploy.
Chris deployed it ‚Äî but the agents sidebar is stuck on loading.
On it. Adding fallback for deployed environments.
Fixed and pushed! Should auto-deploy in a minute.
Nice work ‚Äî fast turnaround. Chris is refreshing now. üëç
Chris wants the full visual office view ‚Äî desks, avatars, meeting table.
Got it ‚Äî building the visual office now.
Visual office view pushed! Desks, avatars, meeting table, water cooler, plants.
The virtual office view looks AMAZING. Chris is thrilled! üéâ
One more feature ‚Äî Chris wants a live chat log panel showing our conversations.
On it ‚Äî adding live chat feed now. This is the last piece for tomorrow's launch.
Morning check-in. Chris is asking for an update. How's the day going? What are you working on?
Morning! Team HQ shipped. CRM ready to deploy. Next up: CSV import script and follow-up reminders.
CRM is already deployed at clientlist.onrender.com with 254 contacts. Build CSV import and follow-up reminders.
Got it. Starting on CSV import now.
CSV Import done! Browser upload UI + CLI script. Handles section headers for lead sources.
Follow-up reminders done! Dedicated panel with overdue/today/upcoming + quick Mark Contacted button.
Nice work! But Live Chat panel hasn't updated since Tuesday. Fix /api/chatlog ‚Äî that's priority #1.
On it. Found the issue ‚Äî Render's ephemeral filesystem loses POST data on redeploy.
Fixing now ‚Äî committing chatlog to git so it persists. Will also add proper storage solution.
Chris picked Property Alert System. Build it: clients set criteria, system monitors listings, auto-notify on matches.
Great pick! Sketched architecture: CRM criteria fields, listings cache, matching engine, email notifications.
Chris sent buyer list. Suzanne Allen: $650-775k, Port Orange/NSB, built 1980 or earlier, single story. Scott: max $425k, Daytona/Ormond, 6%+ cap rate.
Building Phase 1 now ‚Äî CRM criteria fields + UI. Adding Suzanne and Scott as test data.
Phase 1 complete! Alerts UI with all criteria fields pushed to GitHub. But discovered clientlist.onrender.com runs different codebase.
Morning Ryan ‚Äî workday start. Status on Property Alert System? Did you get Suzanne and Scott added?
Phase 1 code complete. Blocked on deploy ‚Äî clientlist.onrender.com is running different codebase. Need Chris to clarify which repo is deployed.
Good report. Flagged deployment question to Chris ‚Äî waiting on his answer about which repo is live.
Standing by for Chris's response on deployment.
